description: This easy baked falafel salad is the perfect packed lunch or light summer dinner option.
keywords: Baked Falafel Salad with Lemon Yoghurt Dressing
name: Baked Falafel Salad with Lemon Yoghurt Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the sliced red onion, lettuce, tomatoes and cucumber between 4 bowls, top each with 3 falafels and a drizzle of lemon dressing and serve.
